top.title: US immigration agent fatally shoots woman in Minneapolis
top.summary: Trump says the woman was attempting to run over ICE agents. Local leaders disagree.

top.title: US seizes two 'shadow fleet' tankers linked to Venezuelan oil
top.summary: The ships were boarded by US forces in predawn operations in the North Atlantic and the Caribbean Sea.

top.title: Footage shows violent clashes as Iran protests spread to more areas
top.summary: Semi-official Iranian media say two police were killed in a western town, as videos show security forces firing guns and tear gas at crowds elsewhere.

top.title: Elon Musk's Grok AI appears to have made child sexual imagery, says charity
top.summary: It said analysts discovered the images on a dark-web forum, by users who claimed to have used Grok

top.title: Inside the sub-zero lair of the world's most powerful computer
top.summary: Faisal Islam gets rare access to Willow - Google's quantum computer.

top.title: Government demands Musk's X deals with 'appalling' Grok AI deepfakes
top.summary: Grok is being used to digitally remove women's clothing - something victims describe as "dehumanising".
